definition: the most pleasant or enjoyable stage

sentences.english: It is also true of painting.
sentences.chinese: 畫畫也是這樣，總是在似醉非醉的狀態忠進入佳境。

sentences.english: He's kind of getting better, but slowly.
sentences.chinese: 他的種漸入佳境，但進展緩慢。

sentences.english: The search engines and Google in particular are getting better at indexing dynamic pages.
sentences.chinese: 搜索引擎谷歌尤其是在漸入佳境索引動態頁面。

sentences.english: My feeling is getting better now.
sentences.chinese: 現在我的感覺是漸入佳境。

sentences.english: Cape Mount has beautiful scenery and quiet environment, is indeed visit to Cuba Probe into the nirvana.
sentences.chinese: 角山風景秀麗，環境清幽，實爲探幽訪古之佳境。

sentences.english: Relations worsened as Microsoft took off.
sentences.chinese: 隨着微軟漸入佳境，他們的關係開始惡化。

sentences.english: Thee lingering rain, is a nirvana of life.
sentences.chinese: 纏綿的春雨，是淡泊明志的人生佳境。

sentences.english: Keep learning and getting better at this one method of trading.
sentences.chinese: 在這個不斷學習與漸入佳境交易方法之一。

definition: lit. the willow trees make the shade, the flowers give the light (idiom); at one's darkest hour, a glimmer of hope/light at the end of the tunnel
woods and ravines/tranquillity of trees and valleys
lit. verdant hills and limpid water (idiom)/fig. enchanting scenery
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]
